markdownRemark.excerpt: Better Handling of Chinese in Git Commands Two settings help:  in gitconfig will disable the quoting for Chinese charactors. using  in gst can do similar thing
markdownRemark.html:
Better Handling of Chinese in Git Commands

Two settings help:

  • core.quotepath = off in gitconfig will disable the quoting for Chinese charactors.
  • using -z in gst can do similar thing

frontmatter.title: Chinese Output in Git Commands
frontmatter.description: Better handing Chinese in Git commands
